title: Will bitcoins be extensively used in the near future? - Quora

response.answer_text: Bitcoins make transactions easier and faster. It eliminates the possibility of forgery and counterfeiting of currency. As all industries are digitizing, the use of bitcoins will make businesses more efficient and transactions will be carried out in the blink of an eye. However, risks associated with bitcoins are alot. Absence of regulations controlling virtual currencies gives rise to illegal activities. Bitcoins are demanded as ransom by cyber attackers and illegal transactions are taking place in bitcoins. Bitcoins definitely has a future in corporate and international transactions.
